<p><strong><span style="font-size: 13.5pt;">Hi Subscriber,</span></strong></p>
<p><strong><strong><span style="font-size: 13.5pt;">Today we are offering Ciabot Berton <br> Barolo Riserva 2004 <br> Magnum (1.5 Liter) <br> originally priced at </span><span style="font-size: 13.5pt;">$200.00</span><span style="font-size: 13.5pt;"> and available now for only </span><span style="font-size: 16.5pt;">$119.99</span><span style="font-size: 13.5pt;">.</span><br />
